lines.text:
[Attempting to ask her out]
What have you got on tonight?
Nothing I can't get out of. Why?

[pouring brandy into glass]
You're quite sure that this is fit for a lady?
Oh, you have a pretty mouth!
Really? Well, shall we introduce them?
And Dickie, I bought a new lace nightie yesterday that's positively indecent. Wait till you see it!
